entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 07:31 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 07:31 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
